hash.description: The hash of this block encoded as hex.

proposer.description: The proposer represents the index of proposer from consensus group.

validators.description: The validators represents the indexes of all validator that should have signed for this block.

size.description: The size of this block in serialized block format, counted in bytes.

stateRootHash.description: The state root hash of this block encoded as hex.

prevHash.description: The previous hash represent the hash of previous block encoded as hex.

shardId.description: The shard id represents the uint32 representation of shard id of this block.

txCount.description: The txCount represents the number of transaction that was included in this block.

shardBlocks.description: Contains an array of blocks. (We need this because we have a multi sharded architecture.
